/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the sky, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, white, and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
